definition.text: The Governance Project is the section of the Superalgos Platform that enables the distributed governance of the Superalgos Project.

translations.text: The Governance Project es la secci√≥n de la plataforma Superalgos que posibilita la gobernanza distribuida del Superalgos Project.

paragraphs.text: Use this hierarchy to spawn project definition hierarchies such as the Pools, Positions, Features and Assets Hierarchies.
This is also where you find the option to spawn the Profile Constructor node.
